about_the_game:
--- Enter the First Person Survival Horror Mystery Explorer ---

"There are some places you should never go... even for those you love..."

Have your sanity tested while searching for your son and finding a way home.
- Explore an interactive environment filled with shadows and mystery
- Interact with doors, furniture, electronics and more
- Manage your character's stamina, flashlight battery and thirst
- Avoid the menace that hunts you at all costs
- Experience rich audio landscapes with original music, artwork and sound effects
- Crafted classic survival horror style ambience

Designed by a small development team with a passion for "Slow Burn" horror.
- All music and audio designed and produced in Austin, Texas
- Free demo
- Soundtrack available
- Made in Unreal 5

All rights reserved
Copyright 2023

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit version
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or 12 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Six-Core Xeon E5-2643 @ 3.4GHz
  • Memory: 64 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 SUPER
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
